direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods process strings to create Pos objects, but split handles a specific delimiter scenario.
Both methods involve processing collections of Pos objects to create a new Pos, with similar control flows and exception handling.
Both methods combine Pos objects to create a new Pos, but plus handles a single Pos addition while of handles offsets.
of method directly depends on lineCol to convert offsets to line and column positions, making it a critical dependency for testing.
